name: The martian-marine
description:
T'was the year 2050, Mlon Eusk  sent a team of the 5 best trained soldiers to conquer Mars before the mass population arrival. It was supposed to be an easy misson.

Weeks later and help did not come, renforecments would not come for at least 4 more days, and whatever killed your team.... Well... They're coming for you.

 music credit: DanMeirmusic@gmail.com
